text: 1. Add a Select widget to the canvas. 2. Create a JS Object and inside of it, create two functions. One function will return the initial/default options to populate the Select widget. The second one will add the new option that was entered by the user to the array of options. In case the new option already exists, it will return an error message. Save the array of options to Appsmith store. 3. In the Select widget, use the value from Appsmith store to display the new options or the initial options, in case this value is empty. 4. In the onOptionChanged event of the Select widget, open a Modal if the user selects other, and in this Modal widget, place an Input widget, where the user will enter the new option. 5. In the onClick event of the Confirm button of the Modal, run the JS function that adds the new option entered by the user. 6. Add a Button widget to the canvas, set a Label for it and in its onClick event, clear the value from Appsmith store, so that only the initial options get displayed in the Select widget.
